snippet.title: Spider-Man 3: Puzzle 2007 (Java) - Longplay
snippet.description:
Well, this game is infinite. There is no end, I think. I've completed 62 levels (another 20 off-screen) and the game still goes on and on and on... Levels seem repeating themselves, so there's no point in playing it more. If you lose all your lives - you must play it from the very beginning and you can't get more, than 9 lives, just like powerups. Some people played through 186 levels and there was no end at all... I think, at some point you get score, that can't be displayed or maybe you can get to the level, where the game crashes, but there's no point in it - it never ends normally, there is no story or something. And to be honest, it gets really boring after maybe 20 levels and for some players even earlier.

----------------------------------
Java playlist:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNGa1kVSWDk1SigG7rMHRQcYLnmtfOVtS
Played on PC using J2Me Loader emulator on BlueStacks Android emulator.
